short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize your life in weeks with this Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a fresh look at life with this new tab page inspired by Oliver Burkeman's book, "Four Thousand Weeks". Each time you open a new tab, see a simple count of your lived weeks out of a possible 4,000. 

This fun reminder helps you think about the value of your time. Make every moment count and bring a new outlook to your online adventures, one tab at a time.
